General.Name: Greatech Technology Bhd
General.Description: Greatech Technology Berhad, an investment holding company, engages in the provision of factory automation solutions and system integration primarily in Malaysia. The company operates through three segments: Production Line Systems, Single Automated Equipment, and Provision of Parts & Services. It designs, develops, and produces system, machinery, and equipment, which is marketed under the Greatech's brand. The company also designs and manufactures single automated equipment and production line system, as well as provides related components and engineering services. In addition, it offers management services; and various service products from conceptualization, engineering development, prototyping, system integration to installation, and commissioning of factory automation, as well as provides customer training, after-sale services, spare parts, retrofits, and equipment relocation services. The company's customers are multinational corporations that are manufacturers of solar panels, electric vehicles, medical and smart devices, and computers and computer peripherals. It also operates in India, Ireland, Malaysia, the People's Republic of China, Singapore, the United Kingdom, the United States of America, and Vietnam. The company was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Bayan Lepas, Malaysia. Greatech Technology Berhad is a subsidiary of GTECH Holdings Sdn. Bhd.
